```{r, exemplarycode echo = TRUE}
numfunction = function(.data, x){
  require(dplyr)
  require(knitr)
    x = enquo(x)
    .data |>
     summarize(
      Minimum = min(!!x, na.rm = T),
      Mean = mean(!!x, na.rm = T),
      Median = median(!!x, na.rm = T),
      Maximum = max(!!x, na.rm = T),
      NAs = sum(is.na(!!x))
    ) |>
      kable(digits = 1L)   
}    
```

```{r, application}
load("/Users/annaweiner/Downloads/Programming/Final-Project/Israel_Peripherality_Data.RData")
numfunction(codebook_clean, population)
```
